title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 573.4 - Revocation, cancellation, limitation or suspension of any operating certificate
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 14 ยง 573.4 - Revocation, cancellation, limitation or suspension of any operating certificate

State Regulations

The commissioner shall not revoke, cancel, limit or suspend
any operating certificate without giving the party in interest notice of the
proposed action and an opportunity to be heard in accordance with Part 503 of
this Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 14
ยง
573.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
